1.quote: 1st RULE: You do not talk about FIGHT CLUB

2.quote: 2nd RULE: You DO NOT talk about FIGHT CLUB.

3.quote: 3rd RULE: If someone says stop or goes limp, taps out the fight is over.

4.quote: 4th rule, only two guys to a fight

5.quote: 5th RULE: One fight at a time.

7.quote: 7th RULE: Fights will go on as long as they have to.

8.quote: 8th RULE: If this is your first night at FIGHT CLUB, you HAVE to fight.
